This randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel efficacy study design investigate lipid-lowering effect 4 week intervention recommend dose plant sterol different dos fish fatty acid combine spread format .

DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy men woman Age ≥ 25 ≤ 75 year old Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 Total cholesterol level screen ≥ 5.0 ≤ 8.0 mmol/L 10year CVD risk equal low 10 % accord `` SCORE '' Blood pressure , heart rate , hematological parameter , clinical chemical parameter within normal reference range Informed consent biobank consent sign Willing comply study protocol study Agreeing inform medically relevant personal testresults physician Not smoke Accessible vein forearm Habitually consume spread Pregnant wish become pregnant , lactate Use prescribed medication may interfere study measurement Use antibiotic 3 month screen study Use medically selfprescribed diet purpose reduce weight Intolerance gluten lactose Reported food allergy Having bleeding disorder Recent blood donation Excessive alcohol consumption Strenuous exercise Reported weight change ≥ 10 % body weight use prescribe weight reduction drug Recent participation another nutritional medical trial Participation night shift work
